SKT_FIRST.name: Whatever!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to grant the caster increased <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>치명 확률</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>会心率</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。

SKT_SECOND.name: To the Beach?
SKT_SECOND.name_jp: みんなもサーフィンしよっ!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: When using this skill, <color=#28d9ed>removes all</color> <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> on the target and attacks the enemy. If the caster is granted increased <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color>, increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>. This attack bypasses the target's Resilience.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 스킬 사용 시 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>모두 해제</color>하고 적을 공격합니다. 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>치명 확률</color>이 증가한 상태라면 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가시킵니다. 이 공격은 대상의 효과 저항을 무시합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: スキル使用時、敵単体の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>すべて解除</color>し、ダメージを与える。自分の<color=#28d9ed>会心率</color>がUPした状態の場合、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPさせる。この攻撃は対象の効果抵抗を無視する。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases damage (Additional increase against Earth enemies)
SKT_BURST_1.effect_kr: 피해 증가 (지속성 적에게는 추가로 피해 증가)
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: ダメージUP\n(地属性の敵には\n追加でダメージUP)

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nResets Gone Surfing! cooldown
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n다들 서핑하러 갔대! 쿨타임 초기화
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n【ハデに決めちゃうし!】\nスキルターン初期化

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Gone Surfing!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. Increases damage dealt to enemies with <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color>.\nWhen the enemy has no <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> or is defeated after this skill is used, grants an <color=#28d9ed>extra turn</color>.\nThis skill deals increased damage to Earth bosses.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다. <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 보유한 적에게 입히는 피해가 증가합니다.\n스킬 사용 후 대상에게 적용된 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>가 없거나, 적이 처치된 경우 <color=#28d9ed>추가 턴</color>을 획득합니다.\n이 스킬은 지속성 보스에게 입히는 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。対象に<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>がある場合、与えるダメージがUPする。\nスキル使用後、対象に<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>がない、または敵が倒れた場合、<color=#28d9ed>追加ターン</color>を獲得する。\nこのスキルは地属性のボスに与えるダメージがUPする。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Attacks an enemy and increases <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> of the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to increase <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> of the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 적을 공격하고 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>치명 확률</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:敵単体にダメージを与え、自分の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>会心率</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
